name: chiburui
description:
2d fighting game, closely inspired by iaido and japanese wood prints.

quick and simple fights with a unique 3-level stance system! it does get more advanced though: use the stance-based damage system and movement in your favor! become the master with timed windups, stance mixups and always use your stamina wisely!

complete the short kata challenges or play locally against a friend!

more game modes and challenges to come in the future!

controller is very much recommended. while keyboard controls are there, and it is possible to beat the game with keyboard, it will be much easier with a controller.
